metadata.name: Dark Moon of Draconis
metadata.description:
Gazing down upon Alpha Draconis like an all seeing eye there orbits the mysterious Dark Moon of Draconis. 

This celestial body radiates an ancient and mysterious energy that has long guided reptilian masters of the occult throughout the ages. 

The Dark Moon is said to be attuned to the fate of Alpha Draconis, its movements and phases influencing the events on the planet's surface. The powerful reptilian rulers have developed complex astrological systems to study and predict the effects of the Dark Moon's energy on their world.

Legend has it that the Dark Moon holds the key to unlocking untold power and unlocking the secrets of the universe, but only those deemed worthy by the ancient reptilian gods may unlock its mysteries. Despite centuries of study, much about the Dark Moon remains unknown, shrouded in mystery and speculation.

However, one thing is clear - the Dark Moon of Draconis holds a significant place in the history and lore of Alpha Draconis, influencing the destiny of its inhabitants and serving as a symbol of the planet's rich spiritual heritage.
